header.title: Own a smart digital asset within today's most profitable markets.
header.subtitle: We distribute benefit shares during the hold based on the backing and valuation in one of the safest and most profitable funds on the market.

1.title: BDF Token
1.description: A Utility Token, which connects Blockchain, real estate businesses, products and services in one place.

2.title: BDFpay
2.description: Complete solutions for your business to process payments through cryptocurrencies in real time.!

3.title: Marketplace (Soon)
3.description: Buy and sell products and services from anywhere in the world using our marketplace.

us.title: About Us
us.description: BuildDefi is a company made up of a multidisciplinary team that offers an integration platform via Blockchain, initially designed for the real estate market, providing access to solutions and its entire ecosystem of products and services. Acting in a simple and effective way, taking knowledge in the area of technology and decentralized finance, offering business opportunities to all people, anywhere in the world.

motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.description: With a focus on reality and the Blockchain technology of smart contracts, BuildDefi aims to build solid businesses by integrating both worlds, allowing small and medium-sized and large entrepreneurs to be part of this revolution called BuildDefi.

mission.title: Mission and Values
mission.description: Passionate about civil construction and technology, we understand the difficulties of the market with its complexities, we see in Blockchain technology an opportunity to interconnect the real world of business with the decentralized finance of smart contracts. We value the security of our customers and the confidentiality of information during operations, generating a portfolio of loyal customers and business partners.

footer.title: #TeamBuildDefiToken
footer.description: Count on us and our courage and ability to revolutionize the decentralized finance market. We dream big, we are not afraid to make tough decisions that align with our long-term goals. We know that everything always seems to be impossible, until it is done. We invest heavily in a highly skilled team that takes our project to the next level
